# PHYSICS::SET_IN_ARENA_MODE

## Parameters
* **BOOL** inArenaMode

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Related to the lower-end of a vehicles fTractionCurve, e.g., from standing starts and acceleration from low/zero speeds.
